schemaFilterPattern.description: Regex to only fetch tables or databases that matches the pattern.

tableFilterPattern.description: Regex exclude tables or databases that matches the pattern.

databaseFilterPattern.description: Regex to only fetch databases that matches the pattern.

generateSampleData.description: Option to turn on/off generating sample data.

profileSample.description: Percentage of data we want to execute the profiler and tests on. Represented in the range (0, 100).

profileSampleRows.description: No. of rows for data we want to execute the profiler and tests on.

threadCount.description: Number of threads to use during metric computations
